comments_since_last_sample.body: Another rare voice the world has ever seen 💕 love u Amazing,Allie
Quel crying finale di cantare rovina davvero la sua voce. Spero tanto che con qualcuno cambi questa impostazione. Per il resto molto brava.
Please cover i don,t care with the band,
All I can say is WOW!!!!  Just FANTASTIC!!!!!!!!
I could listen to her sing all day❤️

You are pretty, you sound like an angel and you are smart , I
think one of 20 000 can make it to a selfmade millionaire with the age of 16,and you totaly deserve it, you are gonna be a superstar
